name: San Mateo County Surplus Property Program
description: Free surplus office furniture, supplies, and equipment for San Mateo County-based nonprofits and public schools
fullDescription: San Mateo County provides free surplus office furniture, supplies, and equipment to San Mateo County-based nonprofits and public schools.
whatTheyOffer:
- Office furniture (desks, chairs, tables)
- Office supplies
- Equipment and electronics
- Filing and storage solutions
- All items free of charge
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a nonprofit or public school in San Mateo County
2. Request an invitation through the online form
3. Complete registration once invited
4. Browse available items
5. Request items and schedule pickup
